TopicTitle: I dont know where to post

Articles.Content:
I dont know where to post...

MY KSP never load succesful because it keep stop at parts/DRBallbearing/part/DRBbearing and stuck there never finish loading...

I'm use ksp on steam account. I know if i tried delete myself but I dont know if ksp will redownload again. I tried with other game and i had hard time to get it redownload again. I'm not look foward do same ksp
I ran into the same problem. I assume it's a mod. If so, then it just doesn't work for this version. Delete it.
It is the Damned robotics plugin that is the problem, delete it and the game will load with no problems.

Are you using Damned Robotics? I'm guessing due to the DR in the part name. Damned Robotics is currently broken post .20 release so we'll need to wait for it to be updated. Remove those parts and you should be ok.
Oh it's mod... Thank god I didnt use it yet. I dont want do all over start again on munbase mission. My mission report about my base as far at Deaf3279's Munbase Mission
